title: Lagging only on LoL
body:
Hey guys. So in the last 6 months I've moved into a new place with 50/10 down/up. For some reason I only lag on league of legends. I manage to play other games with 50 ping or less no problem. I have tried re installing. I even went as far as reinstalling my whole OS. I have tried contacting help but it wasn't that useful, just generic answers. I have tried hard wired and wireless no difference. And have tried when there is no one else at home. 

The game will start off fine right up until minions spawn. And as soon as they do my ping spikes anywhere from 150-300. And will randomly but often spike for the rest of the game like this. 

(Also tried using other computers)

If anyone has any idea on how to solve this  I'm open to it. 

Thanks

replies.body:
Could you do the following for me to help better determine the nature of your issues,

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.

Hey there,

I don't see much wrong with your network, there's some minor packet loss there though appearing to originate locally.

Are you using a wireless connection?
At the moment I am using a wireless connection. But I have tried a wired connection and experience the same problem.
Odd, Have you tried contacting your ISP about this issue?
Yup. Generic answers. Weird how it seems to only be like this for League of legends and no other games.
Will give this a go and get back to you. I remember doing this previously when opening a ticket but didn't get much of a reply.
